response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking out the prawn from the fridge. The robot now has the prawn in its inventory. The next step is to take out the butter from the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(3) Take out the butter from the fridge
(4) Cook the prawn
(5) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(6) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take out the butter from the fridge
    butter = registry(env,"butter_208")
    EasyGrasp(robot, butter)
    donothing(env)
